title: Web-Based Computer Science Laboratory Education: FTP Protocol Practice-Centered

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Delivery of mobile-friendly content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic operational principles of the FTP protocol through a web-based experimental environment
Learners can execute actual FTP commands (e.g., PUT, GET, LIST) in a mobile environment to perform file transfer processes
Learners can analyze experimental results to propose response strategies for network error scenarios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
